Church and Union Charlotte is located in the heart of uptown on the corner of 5th and Church Streets, just a few blocks from sister restaurant, La Belle Helene.
Church and Union features  Modern-American cuisine by Top Chef Alum Chef Partner Jamie Lynch and Executive Chef Aaron Dearing.
